playlist.title: Inspiring Songs
playlist.creator: Mandy He
playlist.info: A list Inspirational songs that will help you to stay positive.

track.title: When You Say You Love Me
track.creator: Josh Gorban
track.annotation: A lovely music from Josh Gorban, one of my favorite artists.

track.title: You Raise Me Up
track.creator: Josh Gorban
track.annotation: It always touch me with its beautiful lyrics.

track.title: You Are Amazing
track.creator: Josh Gorban
track.annotation: I am always amazed by you, such a beautiful song.
